show.title: Dracula's Curse
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/rUKGb8
show.description: When an ancient vampire lord rises to enslave humanity during a prophesied Blood Moon, a half-vampire warrior with unique powers must unite with a mysterious female hunter to prevent Earth's descent into eternal darkness, while battling his own dual nature and discovering his true destiny.
show.description_secondary: When an ancient vampire lord rises to enslave humanity during a prophesied Blood Moon, a half-vampire warrior with unique powers must unite with a mysterious female hunter to prevent Earth's descent into eternal darkness, while battling his own dual nature and discovering his true destiny.

episodes.title: 5. The Kiss that Changed the Mind
